system.type:
Influence 50, Willpower 40, Adepta Sororitas Background.
Female (not stated but canon).
system.descriptor: Clad in Blessed Power Armour, utterly single minded in their zealous duty to smite the heretic, the xenos, and the daemon. They cause sacred dread in their enemies, and inspire those around them to greater acts of holy devotion.
system.uses: Gain Peer (Adepta Sororitas) and Weapon Training (Bolt) talents, Scholastic Lore (Tactica Imperialis) skill, and Willpower Aptitude. Gain Adepta Sororitas Power Armour, and Godwyn-De'az Bolt Pistol or Flamer. Gain access to set of Sister of Battle Elite Advances.
